wikipedia_page.main: John Cameron was a Scottish professional footballer, who played for Huddersfield Town. He was killed in action in the Great War sometime during 1916.

response: *Jack Cameron (footballer, died 1916), Scottish footballer for Huddersfield Town
*Jack Cameron (footballer, born 1931), Scottish footballer for Dumbarton and Hartlepools
